left_column.find_your_library: Find your multiplayer <1>Steam</1> games library here.
left_column.not_finding_a_game: Can't find one of your games?
left_column.not_multiplayer: It means <1>SteamWGP</1> has determined it's not a multiplayer game and doesn't belong here!
left_column.select_games: Here, you can choose which games to make public or private in <1>Steamders</1>. If there's a game you really dislike or find embarrassing, this page is for you!
left_column.click: Simply by clicking on the game in question, and confirming your action! Easy, right? ðŸ˜‰
left_column.explanations: By joining a <1>Steamder</1>, your private games will not be added to the list of common games among the players in the room.
